God of War Ragnarok – Edition Jotnar PS5/PS4
God of War Ragnarök Jötnar Edition - PS4 and PS5 Entitlements

name: God of War Ragnarök: Jötnar Edition
summary: This edition includes the following Full Game for PS5 and PS4 (DLC), Kratos Darkdale Armo DLC, Atreus Darkdale Attire DLC, Darkdale Blades Handles for the Blades of Chaos DLC, Darkdale Axe Grip for the Leviathan Axe DLC, Avatar Set DLC, Dark Horse Digital Mini Artbook DLC, Official God of War Ragnarök Digital Soundtrack DLC (while supplies last)., 7-Inch Vinyl Record with music by Bear McCreary, The Legendary Draupnir Ring, Brok’s Dice Set, Yggdrasil Cloth Map, Steelbook, 2” Vanir Twins Carvings, 16” Mjölnir Replica, PlayStation 4 Theme DLC
